Package dev.federicocapece.jdaze

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
dev.federicocapece.jdaze.GameObject
dev.federicocapece.jdaze.Camera
public class Camera
extends GameObject
The main camera used by the renderer. For now there can be only one camera.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • getScale

      public float getScale()
      Get the scale of the camera as a float 
       Examples:
 With scale = 1 the camera will render pixel 1:1
 With scale = 2 the camera will be zoomed in and each pixel will render to 4 pixels
 With scale = .5 the camera will be zoomed in and each 4 pixel will be rendered as 1 pixel
      Returns:
      the scale

    • zoomIn

      public void zoomIn​(float multiplier)
      Zoom out the camera by X Multiplier
      Parameters:
      multiplier -

    • zoomOut

      public void zoomOut​(float multiplier)
      Zoom out the camera by X Multiplier
      Parameters:
      multiplier -

    • zoomIn

      public void zoomIn()
      Zoom in the camera by X2

    • zoomOut

      public void zoomOut()
      Zoom out the camera by X2

    • addZoom

      public void addZoom​(float zoom)
      Add a float to the current scale multiplier. This can be useful if you want to gradually zoom in by using deltaTime
      Parameters:
      zoom - the new zoom to add the the scale
